Aboriomoh Femi Raymond, onye a maara aha ya bụ Dremo, bụ onye Naijiria na-ede egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na-edekọ egwu, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri. Ọ na arụ ọrụ na Davido Music Worldwide (DMW) ugbu a.

Dremo si Edo Steeti, Naịjirịa ebe a mụrụ ya, mana o tolitere na obodo Ibadan, Oyo Steeti. Ọ gara George na Duke High School na Ibadan, o mechara hapụ National Open University of Nigeria mgbe afọ nke abụọ ya gasịrị iji nweta oru na DMW.
Dremo malitere egwu mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na ntụrụndụ egwu A.P.P.E, ebe ọ wepụtara 'Normal Levelz' na 'OBT'.

Na 5 Eprel na afọ 2016, Davido tinyere Dremo na Mayorkun bịanyere aka na Davido Music Worldwide. Na 20 Julaị na afọ 2018, Dremo wepụtara EP izizi nke akpọrọ “Codename Volume 1”. N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na afọ 2019, o wepụtara EP nwere egwu ise, “Icen B4 the Cake” dị ka ihe na-esote “Codename Volume 1”. Na 17 Eprel na afọ 2020, o wepụtara “Codename Volume 2” na egwu iri na abụọ. Na 23 Eprel, Dremo na Jeriq wepụtara EP 'Ea$t N We$t’. N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 4 na afọ 2021, o wepụtara otu egwu nke gosipụtara Patoranking nke akpọrọ 'Wonder'
